channel.title: Change the npc's name (server sided) 317 pi
channel.description:
Simple question. How can i change the npcs name to whatever i desire?...
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/xer2hu.jpg[/img]
... Don't tell me to search for a tutorial. If you really think creating an account and posting here was my first option then you're way off my friend...
thanks in advance then..

item.title: Change the npc's name (server sided) 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

    if (i == id) {
        entityDef.name = "New name";
        entityDef.description = "new npc description".readBytes();
    }

Something along the lines of that in EntityDef client sided.

Read full topic
item.source: Change the npc's name (server sided) 317 pi
